mapper.select: SELECT RNO, IDX, REPLYWRITER, REPLY, TO_CHAR(REPLYDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REPLYDATE FROM G_REPLY WHERE IDX = #{ idx } ORDER BY RNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO G_REPLY ( RNO, IDX, REPLYWRITER, REPLY, REPLYDATE ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(RNO), 0)+1 FROM G_REPLY ), #{ idx }, #{ replywriter }, #{ reply }, SYSDATE )
